11.05.2015

At Yale School of Architecture, discourse is soliloquy. (un)disciplined is an independent student forum that defies the school’s status quo by encouraging cross-disciplinary dialogues. Venturing into unfamiliar territory makes our discipline stronger and creates new possibilities for practice, research, and engagement with the wider world. Our speaker series convenes students and scholars from related academic fields to talk about “architecture” broadly defined. When we reach outside our own domain, we become better, more informed architects.

To submit speaker suggestions, please email ysoa.undisciplined@gmail.com
